othello

Class OthelloViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • othello.OthelloViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class OthelloViewController
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    OthelloViewController contains all the code for creating the UI elements and adding them to the program's Frame. It also has an inner class OthelloViewController.Controller for handling the action events from the buttons and the checkbox.
    Since:
    1.8.0_29
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Tyson Moyes
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  OthelloViewController.Controller
      Controller implements ActionListener and handles the action events from the buttons created by OthelloViewController

    • Constructor Detail

      • OthelloViewController

        public OthelloViewController()
        OthelloViewController constructor creates the View Controller

        Calls the super constructor, calls the createGUI() method and adds to the frame

    • Method Detail

      • createGUI

        private void createGUI()
        createGUI calls the methods to create each section of the UI, then adds them to the pane.
        See Also:
        createBoard(), createCommands(othello.OthelloViewController.Controller), createChatInputArea(othello.OthelloViewController.Controller)

      • createBoard

        private void createBoard()
        createBoard creates all elements of the Board pane, which is on the left side of the UI.

        Using a nested for loop, it traverses the 10x10 GridLayout and adds the necessary JLabel elements

      • createCommands

        private void createCommands(OthelloViewController.Controller c)
        createCommands creates all the elements on the right-hand side of the program.
        Parameters:
        c - the Controller object created in createGUI()

      • createChatInputArea

        private void createChatInputArea(OthelloViewController.Controller c)
        createChatInputArea creates the text field and submit button and adds them to the chat Panel
        Parameters:
        c - The Controller object created in createGUI()
